room_title: Escape room "Hijacked At Sea" by 321 Escape Rooms in Melbourne
room_address: 5270 N US HWY 1 Palm Shores, FL 32940
room_description:
You and a group of friends have decided to take a much-needed cruise vacation. On day three of your trip, the unthinkable happens. A group of hijackers boarded the ship at your last port of call. After managing to take over the control room, the hijackers have set the ship on a course to run the ship into a great barrier island and sink it.
Upon completing the mission, the hijackers were able to bar the control room from entry and flee in a getaway boat. The ship’s course must be altered within one hour! If you and your friends are able to successfully break out of your stateroom and into the Bridge – you can avert disaster and save lives!
